#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int deepayan(int n,int k,int m)
{
    if(n==1) return 0;
    return ((deepayan(n-1,k,m+1)+m*k)%n);
}
int main()
{
    int n,t,k;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
    scanf("%d",&n);
    scanf("%d",&k);
    printf("%d\n",(deepayan(n,k,1)+1));}
    return 0;
}
